messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] OT Was Re: TV- help me understand
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Debra Rossing  BTW Kelly - I heard the Bonaroo crowd was a bit miffed that a featured act (Kanye West I think) didn t
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Debra Rossing <debra.rossing@...>

BTW Kelly - I heard the Bonaroo crowd was a bit miffed that a featured
act (Kanye West I think) didn't hit the stage until around 4:30 am. I
immediately thought of your guys. It felt kind of neat to have a bit of
connected-feeling to that.

-=-=-=-=-

<BWG>

They didn't go to Bonaroo this year. Cam's in the Yukon with NOLS, and
Ben didn't want to go without him. Duncan's not quite ready for that
kind of fun. <g>

But I doubt Kanye would have been high on their list to see anyway. <g>

~Kelly
